column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I always get the tonkotsu black with the thick noodles
column3: and it never disappoints. I've always brought my son because they have an incredible kids meal that includes chicken "nuggets"
column5: rice and some other sides for $7 (don't quote me
